short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you thought pirates were bad news, wait until you fight pirate zombies

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you thought pirates were bad news, wait until you fight pirate zombies! Pirates Slay is a fantastic platform game that has similarities to retro games such as Super Mario World and Sonic. You must control your hero and work through a series of different levels. During your journey you must slay the pirate zombies you encounter - watch out, if they get too close they will kill you! Controls: Arrow Key to Move and Jump, SpaceBar to use sword, Z for Bomb, X for Thunderbolt.
